name: Probar Protein Peanut Butter Chocolate Bar
description:
Peanuts and chocolate blended into a tasty bar. Packed with soy protein, and serving up omega 3 and 6 from chia and flax seeds.Ingredients: Soy protein isolate, organic tapioca syrup, ground peanuts, organic agave syrup, organic dried cane syrup, glycerine, fractionated palm kernel oil, organic agave inulin, partially defatted peanut flour, omega blend (flaxseed, chia seed), tapioca starch, cocoa, organic soy protein concentrate, natural flavor, salt, soy lecithin, cocoa(processed with alkali), unsweetened chocolate, gum Arabic, rosemary extract, tocopherols added to protect flavor, citric acid, ascorbic acid.

        Sustainability
